sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts AT4 qualification and qualification at RG 105 25APR24 IOT maintain a high level of readiness with individual weapons proficiency
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: Ensure Bull Troop SMs are fundamentally sound on all levels on marksmanship with the M136 AT4 IOT prepare for upcoming training events and maintain lethality within Bull Troop.
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
12 Bull Troop soldiers are safely familiarized AT4 .
Concept of the Operation: All will draw their respective weapons systems at Troop.
SMs will link-up at the Troop AO for transportation to Range 105.
SMs will SP to Range 105.
Range set- up tutorial, OIC & RSO brief
SMs will conduct PMI
SMs will begin training once range is wet and ammo has been dropped off.
SMs will conduct M136 AT4 qualification at Range 105.
Safety: 1x lane safety will be present for each 1x Soldiers on the range
